text: "She's Got to Be a Saint" is a 1972 song by country singer Ray Price and is the title track to his studio album She's Got to Be a Saint. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles chart and number 2 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Country songs Category:Ray Price (musician) songs
title: She's Got to Be a Saint
